Add these steps before the Commit & Push step:

      - name: Build Super Index (unified + link graph)
        run: python3 scripts/build_super_index.py

      - name: Write content snapshot (jsonl.gz)
        run: python3 scripts/write_content_snapshot.py

And include these in the commit 'git add' list:
  _brain/ai_super_index.json
  _brain/snapshots/*
